trans-unit.source: A trigger action that changes the speed of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Una acción de desencadenador que cambia la velocidad de un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively control a storyboard's speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Use un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> acción con un <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> o <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> para controlar la relación de velocidad de un guión gráfico de forma interactiva.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> propiedad de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> para especificar un nuevo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> la velocidad de animación como una proporción de la velocidad de animación anterior.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si establece la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> en 2, duplica la velocidad de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animaciones y si se establece un valor de 0,5, reducir la velocidad al 50 por ciento.

trans-unit.source: This object affects the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> at anytime after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> begins.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto afecta a la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> en cualquier momento después de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> comienza.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pause the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> and use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio>, when you resume the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, it uses the new speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si hace una pausa el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> y use la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio>, cuando se reanude la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, usa la nueva relación de velocidad.

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, which controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> debe hacer referencia a la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, que controla el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Pausar, reanudar, detener o controlar cualquier otro modo un guión gráfico de forma interactiva

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para poder poner en pausa, reanudar o controlar cualquier otro modo un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> de forma interactiva, establezca la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> propiedad de su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> y usar un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) para controlar haciendo referencia a su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> no se especifica, el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> no se puede controlar de forma interactiva una vez que se ha iniciado.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vea [Cómo: utilizar desencadenadores de eventos para controlar un guión gráfico después de que se inicia](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obtener más información.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece una nueva velocidad de animación de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> como relación de velocidad de la animación anterior.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Utilice esta propiedad para especificar un nuevo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> la velocidad de animación como una proporción de la velocidad de animación anterior.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si establece la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> en 2, duplica la velocidad de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animaciones y si se establece un valor de 0,5, reducir la velocidad al 50 por ciento.
